text: Parliamentary elections for the Croatian Parliament were held on 17 and 18 June 1887 in the Kingdom of Croatia-Slavonia. The People's Party won the elections with 87 out of 110 seats. Elections in 3 districts were suspended.Hrvatska straža, broj 27, 2.7.1887. ==Results== {| class=wikitable style="text-align:right" |- !Party !Seats |- |align=left|People's Party |87 |- |align=left|Party of Rights |9 |- |align=left|Independent People's Party |7 |- |align=left|Centrum |2 |- |align=left|Independent |2 |- |align=left style="background-color:#E9E9E9"|Total |width="30" style="background- color:#E9E9E9"|107 |} ==References== 1887 Croatia Category:Elections in Austria-Hungary Category:1887 in Austria-Hungary Category:June 1887 events Category:Kingdom of Croatia-Slavonia
title: 1887 Croatian parliamentary election
